question:
You recently received a letter from a friend asking for advise about whether to go to college or to try to get a job. You think she should get a job. 
    Write a letter to this friend. In your letter,  
   say why he/she would not enjoy going to college 
   explain why getting a job is a good idea for him/her 
  suggest types of job what would be suitable for him/her.
text: I received your letter 2 days ago, first of ,all I congratulate you on successfully completing  your schooling level and related to that later I  want to suggest that you  should get a job because you have  so many responsibilities to perform for your family moreover the time is also an issue for you even you have to manage task  related to the course so, I think that is sometimes difficult for you.

In addition, I know you face lots of financial crises although have to earn money for sundry expenses , getting a job is the best option for the solution to your all problems because you have to chance to raise  funding for your daily needs. Admittedly,   It helps you to improve your skills and experience.

Finally, In my company 2 vacant places for receptionists so, I would like to advise you to apply for the placement because it gives you the best package of salary and not have to pressure of any  deadline even this will improve your confidence and skill of communication.
